title: Sleek Taipei Escape in Dazzling Da'an District
description: Escape to a sophisticated urban sanctuary in the heart of the dazzling Da'an district at the tranquil Kimpton Da An Hotel. Step out of your modern hotel to savour scrumptious street food at the bustling night markets, stroll through verdant gardens and experience the captivating heritage of museums and temples. In between adventures, look out over the stunning skyline of Taipei from the rooftop terrace and enjoy creative, modern cuisine at the Tavernist restaurant.
offer_address: No. 25, Lane 27, Section 4, Ren'ai Rd, Daâ€™an District, Taipei City, 106 Taiwan
